commit.message:
re PR c/53060 (Typo in build_binary_op for scalar-vector ops)

2012-04-23  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	PR c/53060
	* c-typeck.c (build_binary_op): Fix typo.

	* gcc.dg/pr53060.c: New testcase.

From-SVN: r186696
